verbs.description: [ARG1: Judge Andrew Napolitano] [V: appeared] [ARGM-LOC: on Fox & Friends] [ARGM-PRP: to react to former FBI Director James Comey 's CNN interview from Thursday night in which he explained his decision to leak memos on his interactions with President Donald Trump to the press] .
